paragraph: A pithy two-hour excerpt of `` Everything I Know '' greets visitors to `` The Utopian Impulse , '' a new exhibition about (u'Bucky Fuller', 'COREF') and their influence on the Bay Area , opening Friday at the San Francisco Museum of Modern Art . `` We could n't find a player that could handle 42 hours of video , '' said (u'Jennifer Dunlop Fletcher', 'COREF') , (u'Jennifer Dunlop Fletcher', 'COREF') . On the monitor behind her , the video played and (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') said , `` (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') information stimulus from the brain is always terminal , so all (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') inputs are finite . ''

paragraph: (u'Bucky Fuller', 'COREF') , more even than the geodesic domes that made (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') famous , was (u'Bucky Fuller', 'COREF') . `` (u'Bucky Fuller', 'COREF') spent a lot more time talking than doing , '' (u'Jennifer Dunlop Fletcher', 'COREF') said . (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') died in 1983 .

paragraph: Even the things (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') created were most compelling for the ways (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') described them . For instance , (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') three-wheel automobile -- represented in the exhibition by a large photograph overlaid with patent drawings -- was a commercial flop after a prototype crashed at the 1933 Chicago World 's Fair .

Yet (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') underlying notion of doing `` the most with the least '' -- streamlining the car like an airplane for maximum efficiency -- was decades ahead of Ford 's steel-trap thinking , an example of anticipatory design -LRB- synthesizing art , science , engineering and economics -RRB- if ever there was one . By the 1960s , (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') had found a mass audience , not within the auto industry but within the emerging counterculture , for which the idea of doing less with more was apposite . (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') gave lectures of epic length , inspiring renegades half (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') age to act on (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') beliefs .
% 13129 % The Whole Earth Catalog , first published in Menlo Park in 1968 , was dedicated to (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') .

`` (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') lectures have a raga quality of rich , nonlinear , endless improvisation , '' read an introductory tribute by (u'Stewart Brand', 'COREF') , the publisher . From (u'Stewart Brand', 'COREF') LSD-enhanced perspective , (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') preached self-sufficiency , which (u'Stewart Brand', 'COREF') sought to realize via (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') catalog -- a mail-order sourcebook for everything from hunting boots to CB radios . `` (u'Stewart Brand', 'COREF') was persuaded by (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') , '' (u'Stewart Brand', 'COREF') wrote in an email , `` whereas politics often was a complete distraction . ''

paragraph: (u'Jennifer Dunlop Fletcher', 'COREF') has included several vintage Whole Earth Catalogs in the exhibit , as well as one product that (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') consulted on personally : the Oval Intention geodesic tent , first produced in Berkeley in the '70s by the North Face . `` When (u'Stewart Brand', 'COREF') talk about the efficiency of being able to assemble a geodesic dome with one hand behind (u'Stewart Brand', 'COREF') back , '' said (u'Jennifer Dunlop Fletcher', 'COREF') , `` that 's the North Face tent . '' And unlike the trussed domes (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') built , it did n't break or leak .

paragraph: After (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') died , at 87 , enthusiasm for (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') teachings cooled outside a small circle of acolytes , who sought , through seminars and books , to turn the freest of free thinkers into the high priest of a cult . Only in the past decade have (u'Bucky Fuller', 'COREF') re-emerged .
% related % (u'Thom Mayne', 'COREF') , incorporates a `` living skin '' of automatically adjusting windows said to be influenced by (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') .

Represented by a 2007 study model in the exhibition , (u'Thom Mayne', 'COREF') building embodies the practical application of one of Fuller 's most outlandish ideas : to enclose Midtown Manhattan under a dome that would moderate temperature swings to foster a `` Garden of Eden interior . ''
speaker: Thom Mayne

paragraph: Yet the most fertile 21st-century application of (u'Bucky Fuller', 'COREF') has been in realms (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') could scarcely have imagined . `` (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') had the notion that if you just had access to information , all the world 's problems would be solved , '' (u'Jennifer Dunlop Fletcher', 'COREF') said . The Internet has finally made that possible , albeit not for everyone .
speaker: Jennifer Dunlop Fletcher
quotations: `` Buckminster Fuller had the notion that if you just had access to information , all the world 's problems would be solved , ''

paragraph: The One Laptop per Child initiative , a nonprofit organization that gives cheap , durable tablets called XO Laptops to children , is arguably the most ambitious attempt to address the global imbalance in information access . So far , 2.6 million XOs have been distributed in countries from Uruguay to Rwanda . (u'Yves B\xe9har', 'COREF') , (u'Yves B\xe9har', 'COREF') , did not create it in accordance with the geometry of the universe , but (u'Yves B\xe9har', 'COREF') considers (u'Yves B\xe9har', 'COREF') indebted to (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') . `` (u'Yves B\xe9har', 'COREF') think the notion of the utopian design project is alive in (u'Yves B\xe9har', 'COREF') generation of designers , and (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') has had a lot to do with it , '' (u'Yves B\xe9har', 'COREF') said . `` The confidence to challenge the status quo has come from pioneers such as (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') . ''
speaker: Yves Béhar
quotations: `` Yves Béhar think the notion of the utopian design project is alive in Yves Béhar generation of designers , and Buckminster Fuller has had a lot to do with it , ''

paragraph: If (u'Bucky Fuller', 'COREF') serve technology well , technology has returned the favor . (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') resurgent influence can partly be attributed to nostalgia for midcentury design and '60s counterculture . But the Web has proved more decisive in (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') renewed popularity , allowing (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') to speak freely again , unconstrained by disciples .

Despite attempts by the Buckminster Fuller Institute to control video of (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') lectures , most of `` Everything (u'Buckminster Fuller', 'COREF') '' has been anonymously uploaded to YouTube .
